summary: Removes the spells Flames and Healing as starting spells for the player.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the spells Flames and Healing as starting spells for the player.

NOTE:
-It does so by editing the Player form, so it won\'t be compatible with other mods that edit the Player
-Does not add spell books for Flames and Healing so it may be necessary to use console or create mod with spell books

This was created as demonstration for a particular user so it is not really intended for serious use nor will I be adding features or updating this file.

A better way to do this would probably to use a Papyrus script that does Game.GetPlayer().RemoveSpell(SpellForm)
author: DefiniteIntegral
